original_title: Heil Hitler! Confessions of a Hitler Youth
overview: This short-form documentary focuses on the  true story of Alfons Heck, who as an impressionable 10-year-old boy  became a high-ranking member of the Hitler youth movement during World War II.  The story is told in his own words. This film originally aired as part of the "America Undercover" series on HBO.
tagline: GERMANY IN THE DAYS WHEN GOD WORE A SWASTIKA
title: Heil Hitler! Confessions of a Hitler Youth
